resources:
My Duties
Task Tracking Group Task Tracing Location Based Task Tracing
You will be able to see the tasks assigned to you and receive notifications for unfinished tasks. You will be able to create groups for task assignments and make reminders for your group friends. You will be able to receive notifications for the tasks you have forgotten with location definitions.
